timeline.message:
Fix null check compiler warnings.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
It's good to prevent NPEs this way. Though it's also a best practice to prevent bugs by always adding the curly braces for single line if statements. Probably your IDE can insert them automatically on saves? Please also check the other occurrences.

Suggested change
if (localBinder != null)
localBinder.channelsChanged();
if (localBinder != null) {
localBinder.channelsChanged();
}
timeline.author: wborn

replies.bodyText: I'll have to look into the VSCode/Java addon settings for this, regardless I've gone through all the code and made sure single line if statements have curly braces.
replies.author: Cossey

timeline.message:
Ensure all single line if statements contain curly braces.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>
